   21: -module(ssh_pubkey_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   24: -export([
   25:          suite/0,
   26:          all/0,
   27:          groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          end_per_suite/1,
   30:          init_per_group/2,
   31:          end_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_testcase/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -export([
   37:          check_dsa_disabled/1,
   38:          check_rsa_sha1_disabled/1,
   39:          connect_dsa_to_dsa/1,
   40:          connect_dsa_to_ecdsa/1,
   41:          connect_dsa_to_ed25519/1,
   42:          connect_dsa_to_ed448/1,
   43:          connect_dsa_to_rsa_sha2/1,
   44:          connect_ecdsa_to_dsa/1,
   45:          connect_ecdsa_to_ecdsa/1,
   46:          connect_ecdsa_to_ed25519/1,
   47:          connect_ecdsa_to_ed448/1,
   48:          connect_ecdsa_to_rsa_sha2/1,
   49:          connect_ed25519_to_dsa/1,
   50:          connect_ed25519_to_ecdsa/1,
   51:          connect_ed25519_to_ed25519/1,
   52:          connect_ed25519_to_ed448/1,
   53:          connect_ed25519_to_rsa_sha2/1,
   54:          connect_ed448_to_dsa/1,
   55:          connect_ed448_to_ecdsa/1,
   56:          connect_ed448_to_ed25519/1,
   57:          connect_ed448_to_ed448/1,
   58:          connect_ed448_to_rsa_sha2/1,
   59:          connect_rsa_sha1_to_dsa/1,
   60:          connect_rsa_sha2_to_dsa/1,
   61:          connect_rsa_sha2_to_ecdsa/1,
   62:          connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed25519/1,
   63:          connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed448/1,
   64:          connect_rsa_sha2_to_rsa_sha2/1,
   65: 
   66:          ssh_rsa_public_key/1,
   67:          ssh_dsa_public_key/1,
   68:          ssh_ecdsa_public_key/1,
   69:          ssh_rfc4716_rsa_comment/1,
   70:          ssh_rfc4716_dsa_comment/1,
   71:          ssh_rfc4716_rsa_subject/1,
   72:          ssh_list_public_key/1,
   73:          ssh_known_hosts/1,
   74:          ssh1_known_hosts/1,
   75:          ssh_auth_keys/1,
   76:          ssh1_auth_keys/1,
   77:          ssh_openssh_key_with_comment/1,
   78:          ssh_openssh_key_long_header/1,
   79: 
   80:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5_implicit/1,
   81:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5/1,
   82:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha/1,
   83:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha256/1,
   84:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha384/1,
   85:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha512/1,
   86:          ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_list/1,
   87: 
   88:          chk_known_hosts/1,
   89:          ssh_hostkey_pkcs8/1
   90:         ]).
   91: 
   92: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   93: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   94: -include("ssh_test_lib.hrl").
   95: 
   96: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   97: %%% Common Test interface functions -------------------------------
   98: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   99: 
  100: suite() ->
  101:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  102:      {timetrap,{seconds,20}}].
  103: 
  104: all() -> 
  105:     [{group, old_format},
  106:      {group, new_format},
  107:      {group, option_space},
  108:      {group, ssh_hostkey_fingerprint},
  109:      {group, ssh_public_key_decode_encode},
  110:      {group, pkcs8},
  111:      chk_known_hosts
  112:     ].
  113: 
  114: 
  115: -define(tests_old, [connect_rsa_sha2_to_rsa_sha2,
  116:                     connect_rsa_sha1_to_dsa,
  117:                     connect_rsa_sha2_to_dsa,
  118:                     connect_rsa_sha2_to_ecdsa,
  119:                     connect_dsa_to_rsa_sha2,
  120:                     connect_dsa_to_dsa,
  121:                     connect_dsa_to_ecdsa,
  122:                     connect_ecdsa_to_rsa_sha2,
  123:                     connect_ecdsa_to_dsa,
  124:                     connect_ecdsa_to_ecdsa,
  125:                     connect_dsa_to_ed25519,
  126:                     connect_ecdsa_to_ed25519,
  127:                     connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed25519,
  128:                     connect_dsa_to_ed448,
  129:                     connect_ecdsa_to_ed448,
  130:                     connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed448
  131:                    ]).
  132: 
  133: -define(tests_new, [connect_ed25519_to_dsa,
  134:                     connect_ed25519_to_ecdsa,
  135:                     connect_ed25519_to_ed448,
  136:                     connect_ed25519_to_ed25519,
  137:                     connect_ed25519_to_rsa_sha2,
  138:                     connect_ed448_to_dsa,
  139:                     connect_ed448_to_ecdsa,
  140:                     connect_ed448_to_ed25519,
  141:                     connect_ed448_to_ed448,
  142:                     connect_ed448_to_rsa_sha2
  143:                     | ?tests_old % but taken from the new format directory
  144:                    ]).
  145: 
  146: groups() ->
  147:     [{new_format,  [], ?tests_new},
  148:      {old_format,  [], [check_dsa_disabled, check_rsa_sha1_disabled | ?tests_old++[{group,passphrase}] ]},
  149:      {passphrase,  [], ?tests_old},
  150:      {option_space,[], [{group,new_format}]},
  151:      {pkcs8, [], [ssh_hostkey_pkcs8]},
  152: 
  153:      {ssh_hostkey_fingerprint, [],
  154:       [ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5_implicit,
  155:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5,
  156:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha,
  157:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha256,
  158:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha384,
  159:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha512,
  160:        ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_list]},
  161: 
  162:      {ssh_public_key_decode_encode, [],
  163:       [ssh_rsa_public_key, ssh_dsa_public_key, ssh_ecdsa_public_key,
  164:        ssh_rfc4716_rsa_comment, ssh_rfc4716_dsa_comment,
  165:        ssh_rfc4716_rsa_subject,
  166:        ssh_list_public_key,
  167:        ssh_known_hosts, %% ssh1_known_hosts,
  168:        ssh_auth_keys, %% ssh1_auth_keys,
  169:        ssh_openssh_key_with_comment,
  170:        ssh_openssh_key_long_header]}
  171:     ].
  172: 
  173: 
  174: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  175: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  176:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(
  177:        begin
  178: 	   ssh:start(),
  179: 	   [{client_opts,[]},
  180:             {daemon_opts,[]}
  181:             | Config]
  182:        end).
  183: 
  184: end_per_suite(_onfig) ->
  185:     ssh:stop().
  186: 
  187: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  188: init_per_group(new_format, Config) ->
  189:     Dir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "new_format"),
  190:     [{fmt,new_format},
  191:      {key_src_dir,Dir} | Config];
  192: 
  193: init_per_group(old_format, Config) ->
  194:     Dir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "old_format"),
  195:     [{fmt,old_format},
  196:      {key_src_dir,Dir} | Config];
  197: 
  198: init_per_group(pkcs8, Config) ->
  199:     Dir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "pkcs8"),
  200:     [{fmt,pkcs8},
  201:      {key_src_dir,Dir} | Config];
  202: 
  203: init_per_group(option_space, Config) ->
  204:     extend_optsL([client_opts,daemon_opts],
  205:                  [{key_cb, {ssh_file, [{optimize, space}]}}],
  206:                  Config);
  207: 
  208: init_per_group(passphrase, Config0) ->
  209:     case supported(hashs, md5) of
  210:         true ->
  211:             Dir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config0), "old_format_passphrase"),
  212:             PassPhrases = [{K,"somepwd"} || K <- [dsa_pass_phrase,
  213:                                                   rsa_pass_phrase,
  214:                                                   ecdsa_pass_phrase]],
  215:             Config1 = extend_optsL(client_opts, PassPhrases, Config0),
  216:             replace_opt(key_src_dir, Dir, Config1);
  217:         false ->
  218:             {skip, "Unsupported hash"}
  219:     end;
  220: 
  221: init_per_group(ssh_public_key_decode_encode, Config) ->
  222:     [{pk_data_dir,
  223:       filename:join([proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  224:                      "public_key"])
  225:      } | Config];
  226: 
  227: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  228:     Config.
  229: 
  230: 
  231: extend_optsL(OptNames, Values, Config) when is_list(OptNames) ->
  232:     lists:foldl(fun(N, Cnf) ->
  233:                         extend_optsL(N, Values, Cnf)
  234:                 end, Config, OptNames);
  235: extend_optsL(OptName, Values, Config) when is_atom(OptName) ->
  236:     Opts = proplists:get_value(OptName, Config),
  237:     replace_opt(OptName, Values ++ Opts, Config).
  238: 
  239: replace_opt(OptName, Value, Config) ->      
  240:     lists:keyreplace(OptName, 1, Config, {OptName,Value}).
  241: 
  242: 
  243: 
  244: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  245:     Config.
  246: 
  247: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  248: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_pkcs8, Config0) ->
  249:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  250: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha2_to_rsa_sha2, Config0) ->
  251:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  252: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha1_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  253:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha1, dsa, Config0);
  254: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha2_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  255:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, dsa, Config0);
  256: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha2_to_ecdsa, Config0) ->
  257:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, ecdsa, Config0);
  258: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed25519, Config0) ->
  259:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, ed25519, Config0);
  260: init_per_testcase(connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed448, Config0) ->
  261:     setup_user_system_dir(rsa_sha2, ed448, Config0);
  262: init_per_testcase(connect_dsa_to_rsa_sha2, Config0) ->
  263:     setup_user_system_dir(dsa, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  264: init_per_testcase(connect_dsa_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  265:     setup_user_system_dir(dsa, dsa, Config0);
  266: init_per_testcase(connect_dsa_to_ecdsa, Config0) ->
  267:     setup_user_system_dir(dsa, ecdsa, Config0);
  268: init_per_testcase(connect_dsa_to_ed25519, Config0) ->
  269:     setup_user_system_dir(dsa, ed25519, Config0);
  270: init_per_testcase(connect_dsa_to_ed448, Config0) ->
  271:     setup_user_system_dir(dsa, ed448, Config0);
  272: init_per_testcase(connect_ecdsa_to_rsa_sha2, Config0) ->
  273:     setup_user_system_dir(ecdsa, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  274: init_per_testcase(connect_ecdsa_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  275:     setup_user_system_dir(ecdsa, dsa, Config0);
  276: init_per_testcase(connect_ecdsa_to_ecdsa, Config0) ->
  277:     setup_user_system_dir(ecdsa, ecdsa, Config0);
  278: init_per_testcase(connect_ecdsa_to_ed25519, Config0) ->
  279:     setup_user_system_dir(ecdsa, ed25519, Config0);
  280: init_per_testcase(connect_ecdsa_to_ed448, Config0) ->
  281:     setup_user_system_dir(ecdsa, ed448, Config0);
  282: init_per_testcase(connect_ed25519_to_rsa_sha2, Config0) ->
  283:     setup_user_system_dir(ed25519, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  284: init_per_testcase(connect_ed25519_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  285:     setup_user_system_dir(ed25519, dsa, Config0);
  286: init_per_testcase(connect_ed25519_to_ecdsa, Config0) ->
  287:     setup_user_system_dir(ed25519, ecdsa, Config0);
  288: init_per_testcase(connect_ed25519_to_ed25519, Config0) ->
  289:     setup_user_system_dir(ed25519, ed25519, Config0);
  290: init_per_testcase(connect_ed25519_to_ed448, Config0) ->
  291:     setup_user_system_dir(ed25519, ed448, Config0);
  292: init_per_testcase(connect_ed448_to_rsa_sha2, Config0) ->
  293:     setup_user_system_dir(ed448, rsa_sha2, Config0);
  294: init_per_testcase(connect_ed448_to_dsa, Config0) ->
  295:     setup_user_system_dir(ed448, dsa, Config0);
  296: init_per_testcase(connect_ed448_to_ecdsa, Config0) ->
  297:     setup_user_system_dir(ed448, ecdsa, Config0);
  298: init_per_testcase(connect_ed448_to_ed25519, Config0) ->
  299:     setup_user_system_dir(ed448, ed25519, Config0);
  300: init_per_testcase(connect_ed448_to_ed448, Config0) ->
  301:     setup_user_system_dir(ed448, ed448, Config0);
  302: 
  303: init_per_testcase(check_dsa_disabled, Config0) ->
  304:     setup_default_user_system_dir(dsa, Config0);
  305: init_per_testcase(check_rsa_sha1_disabled, Config0) ->
  306:     setup_default_user_system_dir(rsa_sha1, Config0);
  307: 
  308: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5_implicit, Config) ->
  309:     init_fingerprint_testcase([md5], Config);
  310: 
  311: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5, Config) ->
  312:     init_fingerprint_testcase([md5], Config);
  313: 
  314: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha, Config) ->
  315:     init_fingerprint_testcase([sha], Config);
  316: 
  317: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha256, Config) ->
  318:     init_fingerprint_testcase([sha256], Config);
  319: 
  320: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha384, Config) ->
  321:     init_fingerprint_testcase([sha384], Config);
  322: 
  323: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha512, Config) ->
  324:     init_fingerprint_testcase([sha512], Config);
  325: 
  326: init_per_testcase(ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_list  , Config) ->
  327:     init_fingerprint_testcase([sha,md5], Config);
  328: 
  329: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  330:     Config.
  331: 
  332: 
  333: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  334:     Config.
  335: 
  336: %%%----
  337: init_fingerprint_testcase(Algs, Config0) ->
  338:     Hashs = proplists:get_value(hashs, crypto:supports(), []),
  339:     case Algs -- Hashs of
  340:         [] ->
  341:             Config = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  342:             Dog = ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  343:             [{watchdog, Dog} | Config];
  344:         UnsupportedAlgs ->
  345:             {skip,{UnsupportedAlgs,not_supported}}
  346:     end.
  347: 
  348: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  349: %%% Test Cases ----------------------------------------------------
  350: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  351: connect_rsa_sha2_to_rsa_sha2(Config) ->
  352:     try_connect(Config).
  353: 
  354: connect_rsa_sha1_to_dsa(Config) ->
  355:     try_connect(Config).
  356: 
  357: connect_rsa_sha2_to_dsa(Config) ->
  358:     try_connect(Config).
  359: 
  360: connect_rsa_sha2_to_ecdsa(Config) ->
  361:     try_connect(Config). 
  362: 
  363: connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed25519(Config) ->
  364:     try_connect(Config).
  365: 
  366: connect_rsa_sha2_to_ed448(Config) ->
  367:     try_connect(Config).
  368: 
  369: connect_dsa_to_rsa_sha2(Config) ->
  370:     try_connect(Config).
  371: 
  372: connect_dsa_to_dsa(Config) ->
  373:     try_connect(Config).
  374: 
  375: connect_dsa_to_ecdsa(Config) ->
  376:     try_connect(Config). 
  377: 
  378: connect_dsa_to_ed25519(Config) ->
  379:     try_connect(Config).
  380: 
  381: connect_dsa_to_ed448(Config) ->
  382:     try_connect(Config).
  383: 
  384: connect_ecdsa_to_rsa_sha2(Config) ->
  385:     try_connect(Config). 
  386: 
  387: connect_ecdsa_to_dsa(Config) ->
  388:     try_connect(Config). 
  389: 
  390: connect_ecdsa_to_ecdsa(Config) ->
  391:     try_connect(Config).
  392: 
  393: connect_ecdsa_to_ed25519(Config) ->
  394:     try_connect(Config).
  395: 
  396: connect_ecdsa_to_ed448(Config) ->
  397:     try_connect(Config).
  398: 
  399: connect_ed25519_to_rsa_sha2(Config) ->
  400:     try_connect(Config).
  401: 
  402: connect_ed25519_to_dsa(Config) ->
  403:     try_connect(Config).
  404: 
  405: connect_ed25519_to_ecdsa(Config) ->
  406:     try_connect(Config).
  407: 
  408: connect_ed25519_to_ed25519(Config) ->
  409:     try_connect(Config).
  410: 
  411: connect_ed25519_to_ed448(Config) ->
  412:     try_connect(Config).
  413: 
  414: connect_ed448_to_rsa_sha2(Config) ->
  415:     try_connect(Config).
  416: 
  417: connect_ed448_to_dsa(Config) ->
  418:     try_connect(Config).
  419: 
  420: connect_ed448_to_ecdsa(Config) ->
  421:     try_connect(Config).
  422: 
  423: connect_ed448_to_ed25519(Config) ->
  424:     try_connect(Config).
  425: 
  426: connect_ed448_to_ed448(Config) ->
  427:     try_connect(Config).
  428: 
  429: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  430: check_dsa_disabled(Config) ->
  431:     try_connect_disabled(Config).
  432:             
  433: check_rsa_sha1_disabled(Config) ->
  434:     try_connect_disabled(Config).
  435: 
  436: 
  437: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  438: 
  439: %% Check of different host keys left to later
  440: ssh_hostkey_pkcs8(Config) ->
  441:     try_connect(Config).
  442: 
  443: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  444: 
  445: %% Check of different host keys left to later
  446: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5_implicit(_Config) ->
  447:     Expected = "4b:0b:63:de:0f:a7:3a:ab:2c:cc:2d:d1:21:37:1d:3a",
  448:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  449: 
  450: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  451: %% Check of different host keys left to later
  452: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_md5(_Config) ->
  453:     Expected = "MD5:4b:0b:63:de:0f:a7:3a:ab:2c:cc:2d:d1:21:37:1d:3a",
  454:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(md5, ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  455: 
  456: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  457: %% Since this kind of fingerprint is not available yet on standard
  458: %% distros, we do like this instead. The Expected is generated with:
  459: %%       $ openssh-7.3p1/ssh-keygen -E sha1 -lf <file>
  460: %%       2048 SHA1:Soammnaqg06jrm2jivMSnzQGlmk none@example.org (RSA)
  461: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha(_Config) ->
  462:     Expected = "SHA1:Soammnaqg06jrm2jivMSnzQGlmk",
  463:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(sha, ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  464: 
  465: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  466: %% Since this kind of fingerprint is not available yet on standard
  467: %% distros, we do like this instead.
  468: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha256(_Config) ->
  469:     Expected = "SHA256:T7F1BahkJWR7iJO8+rpzWOPbp7LZP4MlNrDExdNYOvY",
  470:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(sha256, ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  471: 
  472: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  473: %% Since this kind of fingerprint is not available yet on standard
  474: %% distros, we do like this instead.
  475: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha384(_Config) ->
  476:     Expected = "SHA384:QhkLoGNI4KXdPvC//HxxSCP3uTQVADqxdajbgm+Gkx9zqz8N94HyP1JmH8C4/aEl",
  477:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(sha384, ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  478: 
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: %% Since this kind of fingerprint is not available yet on standard
  481: %% distros, we do like this instead.
  482: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_sha512(_Config) ->
  483:     Expected = "SHA512:ezUismvm3ADQQb6Nm0c1DwQ6ydInlJNfsnSQejFkXNmABg1Aenk9oi45CXeBOoTnlfTsGG8nFDm0smP10PBEeA",
  484:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint(sha512, ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  485: 
  486: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  487: %% Since this kind of fingerprint is not available yet on standard
  488: %% distros, we do like this instead.
  489: ssh_hostkey_fingerprint_list(_Config) ->
  490:     Expected = ["SHA1:Soammnaqg06jrm2jivMSnzQGlmk",
  491:                 "MD5:4b:0b:63:de:0f:a7:3a:ab:2c:cc:2d:d1:21:37:1d:3a"],
  492:     Expected = ssh:hostkey_fingerprint([sha,md5], ssh_hostkey(rsa)).
  493: 
  494: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  495: ssh_rsa_public_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  496:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  497:     {ok, RSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_rsa_pub")),
  498:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(RSARawSsh2, public_key),
  499:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(RSARawSsh2, rfc4716_key),
  500: 
  501:     {ok, RSARawOpenSsh} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "openssh_rsa_pub")),
  502:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] = ssh_file:decode(RSARawOpenSsh, public_key),
  503:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] = ssh_file:decode(RSARawOpenSsh, openssh_key),
  504: 
  505:     %% Can not check EncodedSSh == RSARawSsh2 and EncodedOpenSsh
  506:     %% = RSARawOpenSsh as line breakpoints may differ
  507: 
  508:     EncodedSSh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes1}], rfc4716_key),
  509:     EncodedOpenSsh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes2}], openssh_key),
  510: 
  511:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] =
  512: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedSSh, public_key),
  513:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] =
  514: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedOpenSsh, public_key).
  515: 
  516: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  517: ssh_dsa_public_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  518:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  519: 
  520:     {ok, DSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_dsa_pub")),
  521:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(DSARawSsh2, public_key),
  522:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(DSARawSsh2, rfc4716_key),
  523: 
  524:     {ok, DSARawOpenSsh} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "openssh_dsa_pub")),
  525:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] = ssh_file:decode(DSARawOpenSsh, public_key),
  526:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] = ssh_file:decode(DSARawOpenSsh, openssh_key),
  527: 
  528:     %% Can not check EncodedSSh == DSARawSsh2 and EncodedOpenSsh
  529:     %% = DSARawOpenSsh as line breakpoints may differ
  530: 
  531:     EncodedSSh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes1}], rfc4716_key),
  532:     EncodedOpenSsh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes2}], openssh_key),
  533: 
  534:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] =
  535: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedSSh, public_key),
  536:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] =
  537: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedOpenSsh, public_key).
  538: 
  539: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  540: ssh_ecdsa_public_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  541:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  542: 
  543:     {ok, ECDSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_ecdsa_pub")),
  544:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(ECDSARawSsh2, public_key),
  545:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] = ssh_file:decode(ECDSARawSsh2, rfc4716_key),
  546: 
  547:     {ok, ECDSARawOpenSsh} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "openssh_ecdsa_pub")),
  548:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] = ssh_file:decode(ECDSARawOpenSsh, public_key),
  549:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] =ssh_file:decode(ECDSARawOpenSsh, openssh_key),
  550: 
  551:     %% Can not check EncodedSSh == ECDSARawSsh2 and EncodedOpenSsh
  552:     %% = ECDSARawOpenSsh as line breakpoints may differ
  553: 
  554:     EncodedSSh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes1}], rfc4716_key),
  555:     EncodedOpenSsh = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes2}], openssh_key),
  556: 
  557:     [{PubKey, Attributes1}] =
  558: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedSSh, public_key),
  559:     [{PubKey, Attributes2}] =
  560: 	ssh_file:decode(EncodedOpenSsh, public_key).
  561: 
  562: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  563: ssh_list_public_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  564:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  565:     {Data_ssh2, Expect_ssh2} =
  566:         collect_binaries_expected(DataDir, rfc4716_key,
  567:                                   ["ssh2_rsa_pub", "ssh2_rsa_comment_pub",
  568:                                    "ssh2_dsa_pub", "ssh2_dsa_comment_pub",
  569:                                    "ssh2_ecdsa_pub", 
  570:                                    "ssh2_subject_pub"]),
  571:     {Data_openssh, Expect_openssh} =
  572:         collect_binaries_expected(DataDir, openssh_key,
  573:                                   ["openssh_rsa_pub", "openssh_dsa_pub", "openssh_ecdsa_pub"]),
  574: 
  575:     true =
  576:         (chk_decode(Data_openssh,   Expect_openssh, openssh_key) andalso
  577:          chk_decode(Data_ssh2,      Expect_ssh2,    rfc4716_key) andalso
  578:          chk_decode(Data_openssh,   Expect_openssh, public_key) andalso
  579:          chk_decode(Data_ssh2,      Expect_ssh2,    public_key) andalso
  580:          chk_encode(Expect_openssh, openssh_key) andalso
  581:          chk_encode(Expect_ssh2,    rfc4716_key)
  582:         ).
  583: 
  584: chk_encode(Data, Type) ->
  585:     case ssh_file:decode(ssh_file:encode(Data,Type), Type) of
  586:         Data->
  587:             ct:log("re-encode ~p ok", [Type]),
  588:             true;
  589:         Result ->
  590:             ct:log("re-encode ~p FAILED~n"
  591:                    "Got~n ~p~nExpect~n ~p~n",
  592:                    [Type, Result, Data]),
  593:             false
  594:     end.
  595: 
  596: 
  597: chk_decode(Data, Expect, Type) ->
  598:     case ssh_file:decode(Data, Type) of
  599:         Expect ->
  600:             ct:log("decode ~p ok", [Type]),
  601:             true;
  602:         BadResult ->
  603:             ct:log("decode ~p FAILED~n"
  604:                    "Result~n ~p~nExpect~n ~p~n"
  605:                    "~p",
  606:                    [Type, BadResult, Expect,
  607:                     if
  608:                         is_list(BadResult) ->
  609:                             lists:foldr(fun({Key,Attrs}, Acc) ->
  610:                                                 case Key of
  611:                                                     #'RSAPublicKey'{} when is_list(Attrs) -> Acc;
  612:                                                     {_, #'Dss-Parms'{}} when is_list(Attrs) -> Acc;
  613:                                                     {#'ECPoint'{}, {namedCurve,_}} when is_list(Attrs) -> Acc;
  614:                                                     _  when is_list(Attrs) -> [{bad_key,{Key,Attrs}}|Acc];
  615:                                                     _ -> [{bad_attrs,{Key,Attrs}}|Acc]
  616:                                                 end;
  617:                                            (Other,Acc) ->
  618:                                                 [{other,Other}|Acc]
  619:                                         end, [], BadResult);
  620:                         true ->
  621:                             '???'
  622:                     end]),
  623:             false
  624:     end.
  625: 
  626: 
  627: collect_binaries_expected(Dir, Type, Files) ->
  628:     Bins0 = [B || F <- Files,
  629:                   {ok,B} <- [ file:read_file(filename:join(Dir,F)) ]
  630:             ],
  631:     {list_to_binary( lists:join("\n", Bins0)),
  632:      lists:flatten([ssh_file:decode(B,Type) || B <- Bins0])}.
  633: 
  634: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  635: ssh_rfc4716_rsa_comment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  636:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  637: 
  638:     {ok, RSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_rsa_comment_pub")),
  639:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{} = PubKey, Attributes}] =
  640:         ssh_file:decode(RSARawSsh2, public_key),
  641: 
  642:     Headers = proplists:get_value(headers, Attributes),
  643: 
  644:     Value = proplists:get_value("Comment", Headers, undefined),
  645:     true = Value =/= undefined,
  646:     RSARawSsh2 = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes}], rfc4716_key).
  647: 
  648: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  649: ssh_rfc4716_dsa_comment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  650:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  651: 
  652:     {ok, DSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_dsa_comment_pub")),
  653:     [{{_, #'Dss-Parms'{}} = PubKey, Attributes}] =
  654:         ssh_file:decode(DSARawSsh2, public_key),
  655: 
  656:     Headers = proplists:get_value(headers, Attributes),
  657: 
  658:     Value = proplists:get_value("Comment", Headers, undefined),
  659:     true = Value =/= undefined,
  660: 
  661:     %% Can not check Encoded == DSARawSsh2 as line continuation breakpoints may differ
  662:     Encoded  = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes}], rfc4716_key),
  663:     [{PubKey, Attributes}] =
  664:         ssh_file:decode(Encoded, public_key).
  665: 
  666: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  667: ssh_rfc4716_rsa_subject(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  668:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  669: 
  670:     {ok, RSARawSsh2} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh2_subject_pub")),
  671:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{} = PubKey, Attributes}] =
  672:         ssh_file:decode(RSARawSsh2, public_key),
  673: 
  674:     Headers = proplists:get_value(headers, Attributes),
  675: 
  676:     Value = proplists:get_value("Subject", Headers, undefined),
  677:     true = Value =/= undefined,
  678: 
  679:     %% Can not check Encoded == RSARawSsh2 as line continuation breakpoints may differ
  680:     Encoded  = ssh_file:encode([{PubKey, Attributes}], rfc4716_key),
  681:     [{PubKey, Attributes}] =
  682:         ssh_file:decode(Encoded, public_key).
  683: 
  684: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  685: ssh_known_hosts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  686:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  687: 
  688:     {ok, SshKnownHosts} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "known_hosts")),
  689:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes1}, {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes2},
  690:      {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes3}, {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes4}] = Decoded =
  691:         ssh_file:decode(SshKnownHosts, known_hosts),
  692: 
  693:     Comment1 = undefined,
  694:     Comment2 = "foo@bar.com",
  695:     Comment3 = "Comment with whitespaces",
  696:     Comment4 = "foo@bar.com Comment with whitespaces",
  697:     	
  698:     Comment1 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes1, undefined),
  699:     Comment2 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes2),
  700:     Comment3 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes3),
  701:     Comment4 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes4),	
  702: 
  703:     Value1 = proplists:get_value(hostnames, Attributes1, undefined),
  704:     Value2 = proplists:get_value(hostnames, Attributes2, undefined),
  705:     true = Value1 =/= undefined andalso Value2 =/= undefined,
  706: 
  707:     Encoded = ssh_file:encode(Decoded, known_hosts),
  708:     Decoded = ssh_file:decode(Encoded, known_hosts).
  709: 
  710: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  711: ssh1_known_hosts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  712:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  713: 
  714:     {ok, SshKnownHosts} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh1_known_hosts")),
  715:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes1}, {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes2},{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes3}] 
  716: 	= Decoded = ssh_file:decode(SshKnownHosts, known_hosts),
  717: 
  718:     Value1 = proplists:get_value(hostnames, Attributes1, undefined),
  719:     Value2 = proplists:get_value(hostnames, Attributes2, undefined),
  720:     true = Value1 =/= undefined andalso Value2 =/= undefined,
  721: 
  722:     Comment ="dhopson@VMUbuntu-DSH comment with whitespaces",
  723:     Comment = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes3),
  724: 
  725:     Encoded = ssh_file:encode(Decoded, known_hosts),
  726:     Decoded = ssh_file:decode(Encoded, known_hosts).
  727: 
  728: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  729: ssh_auth_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  730:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  731: 
  732:     {ok, SshAuthKeys} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "auth_keys")),
  733:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes1}, {{_, #'Dss-Parms'{}}, Attributes2},
  734:      {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes3}, {{_, #'Dss-Parms'{}}, Attributes4}
  735:     ] = Decoded =
  736:         ssh_file:decode(SshAuthKeys, auth_keys),
  737: 
  738:     Value1 = proplists:get_value(options, Attributes1, undefined),
  739:     true = Value1 =/= undefined,
  740: 
  741:     Comment1 = Comment2 = "dhopson@VMUbuntu-DSH",
  742:     Comment3 = Comment4 ="dhopson@VMUbuntu-DSH comment with whitespaces",
  743:     
  744:     Comment1 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes1),
  745:     Comment2 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes2),
  746:     Comment3 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes3),
  747:     Comment4 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes4),
  748: 
  749:     Encoded = ssh_file:encode(Decoded, auth_keys),
  750:     Decoded = ssh_file:decode(Encoded, auth_keys).
  751: 
  752: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  753: ssh1_auth_keys(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  754:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  755: 
  756:     {ok, SshAuthKeys} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh1_auth_keys")),
  757:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes1},
  758:      {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes2}, {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes3},
  759:      {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes4}, {#'RSAPublicKey'{}, Attributes5}] = Decoded =
  760:         ssh_file:decode(SshAuthKeys, auth_keys),
  761: 
  762:     Value1 = proplists:get_value(bits, Attributes2, undefined),
  763:     Value2 = proplists:get_value(bits, Attributes3, undefined),
  764:     true = Value1 =/= undefined andalso Value2 =/= undefined,
  765: 
  766:     Comment2 = Comment3 = "dhopson@VMUbuntu-DSH",
  767:     Comment4 = Comment5 ="dhopson@VMUbuntu-DSH comment with whitespaces",
  768:     
  769:     undefined = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes1, undefined),
  770:     Comment2 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes2),
  771:     Comment3 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes3),
  772:     Comment4 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes4),
  773:     Comment5 = proplists:get_value(comment, Attributes5),
  774: 
  775:     Encoded = ssh_file:encode(Decoded, auth_keys),
  776:     Decoded = ssh_file:decode(Encoded, auth_keys).
  777: 
  778: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  779: ssh_openssh_key_with_comment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  780:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  781: 
  782:     {ok, DSARawOpenSsh} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "openssh_dsa_with_comment_pub")),
  783:     [{{_, #'Dss-Parms'{}}, _}] = ssh_file:decode(DSARawOpenSsh, openssh_key).
  784: 
  785: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  786: ssh_openssh_key_long_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  787:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(pk_data_dir, Config),
  788: 
  789:     {ok,RSARawOpenSsh} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ssh_rsa_long_header_pub")),
  790:     [{#'RSAPublicKey'{}, _}] = Decoded = ssh_file:decode(RSARawOpenSsh, public_key),
  791: 
  792:     Encoded = ssh_file:encode(Decoded, rfc4716_key),
  793:     Decoded = ssh_file:decode(Encoded, rfc4716_key).
  794: 
  795: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  796: %%% Test case helpers
  797: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  798: %% Should use stored keys instead
  799: ssh_hostkey(rsa) ->
  800:     [{PKdecoded,_}] =
  801: 	ssh_file:decode(
  802: 	  <<"ssh-rsa AAAAB3NzaC1yc2EAAAADAQABAAABAQDYXcYmsyJBstl4EfFYzfQJmSiUE162zvSGSoMYybShYOI6rnnyvvihfw8Aml+2gZ716F2tqG48FQ/yPZEGWNPMrCejPpJctaPWhpNdNMJ8KFXSEgr5bY2mEpa19DHmuDeXKzeJJ+X7s3fVdYc4FMk5731KIW6Huf019ZnTxbx0VKG6b1KAJBg3vpNsDxEMwQ4LFMB0JHVklOTzbxmpaeULuIxvl65A+eGeFVeo2Q+YI9UnwY1vSgmc9Azwy8Ie9Z0HpQBN5I7Uc5xnknT8V6xDhgNfXEfzsgsRdDfZLECt1WO/1gP9wkosvAGZWt5oG8pbNQWiQdFq536ck8WQD9WD none@example.org">>,
  803: 	  public_key),
  804:     PKdecoded.
  805: 
  806: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  807: chk_known_hosts(Config) ->
  808:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  809: 
  810:     DataDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config), "new_format"),
  811:     SysDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "chk_known_hosts_sys_dir"),
  812:     ssh_test_lib:setup_all_host_keys(DataDir, SysDir),
  813: 
  814:     UsrDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "chk_known_hosts_usr_dir"),
  815:     file:make_dir(UsrDir),
  816:     KnownHostsFile = filename:join(UsrDir, "known_hosts"),
  817: 
  818:     DaemonOpts = [{system_dir, SysDir},
  819:                   {user_dir, UsrDir},
  820:                   {password, "bar"}],
  821: 
  822:     UserOpts = [{user_dir, UsrDir},
  823:                 {user, "foo"},
  824:                 {password, "bar"},
  825:                 {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  826:                 {user_interaction, false}
  827:                ],
  828: 
  829:     {_Pid1, Host1, Port1} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(DaemonOpts),
  830:     {_Pid2, Host2, Port2} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(DaemonOpts),
  831: 
  832:     _C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host1, Port1, UserOpts),
  833:     {ok,KnownHosts1} = file:read_file(KnownHostsFile),
  834:     Sz1 = byte_size(KnownHosts1),
  835:     ct:log("~p bytes KnownHosts1 = ~p", [Sz1, KnownHosts1]),
  836: 
  837:     _C2 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host2, Port2, UserOpts),
  838:     {ok,KnownHosts2} = file:read_file(KnownHostsFile),
  839:     Sz2 = byte_size(KnownHosts2),
  840:     ct:log("~p bytes KnownHosts2 = ~p", [Sz2, KnownHosts2]),
  841: 
  842:     %% Check that 2nd is appended after the 1st:
  843:     <<KnownHosts1:Sz1/binary, _/binary>> = KnownHosts2,
  844: 
  845:     %% Check that there are exactly two NLs:
  846:     2 = lists:foldl(fun($\n, Sum) -> Sum + 1;
  847:                        (_,   Sum) -> Sum
  848:                     end, 0, binary_to_list(KnownHosts2)),
  849: 
  850:     %% Check that at least one NL terminates both two lines:
  851:     <<_:(Sz1-1)/binary, $\n, _:(Sz2-Sz1-1)/binary, $\n>> = KnownHosts2.
  852: 
  853: 
  854: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  855: try_connect({skip,Reason}) ->
  856:     {skip,Reason};
  857: try_connect(Config) ->
  858:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(system_dir, Config),
  859:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
  860:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config, []),
  861:     DaemonOpts = proplists:get_value(daemon_opts, Config, []),
  862: 
  863:     ssh_dbg:start(fun ct:log/2), ssh_dbg:on([alg]),
  864:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  865: 					     {user_dir, UserDir}
  866:                                              | DaemonOpts]),
  867: 
  868:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, UserDir},
  869:                                           {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  870:                                           {user_interaction, false}
  871:                                           | ClientOpts]),
  872:     ssh:close(C),
  873:     ssh_dbg:stop(),
  874:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  875: 
  876: 
  877: try_connect_disabled(Config) ->
  878:     try try_connect(Config)
  879:     of _ -> {fail, "non-default algorithm accepted"}
  880:     catch error:{badmatch,{error,"Service not available"}} -> ok
  881:     end.
  882: 
  883: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  884: %%% Local ---------------------------------------------------------
  885: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  886: setup_user_system_dir(ClientAlg, ServerAlg, Config) ->
  887:     case supported(public_key, ClientAlg) andalso supported(public_key, ServerAlg) of
  888:         true ->
  889:             try
  890:                 setup_dirs(ClientAlg, ServerAlg, Config)
  891:             of
  892:                 {ok, {SystemDir,UserDir}} ->
  893:                     ModAlgs = [{preferred_algorithms, 
  894:                                 [{public_key, lists:usort([alg(ClientAlg), alg(ServerAlg)])}]
  895:                                }],
  896:                     [{system_dir,SystemDir},
  897:                      {user_dir,UserDir}
  898:                      | extend_optsL([daemon_opts,client_opts], ModAlgs, Config)]
  899:             catch
  900:                 error:{badmatch,{error,enoent}}:S ->
  901:                     ct:log("~p:~p Stack:~n~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,S]),
  902:                     {skip, no_key_file_found}
  903:             end;
  904: 
  905:         false ->
  906:             {skip, unsupported_algorithm}
  907:     end.
  908: 
  909: 
  910: setup_default_user_system_dir(ClientAlg, Config) ->
  911:     ServerAlg = ecdsa,
  912:     case default(public_key, ClientAlg) of
  913:         false ->
  914:             case supported(public_key, ClientAlg) of
  915:                 true ->
  916:                     case supported(public_key, ServerAlg) of
  917:                         true ->
  918:                             try
  919:                                 setup_dirs(ClientAlg, ServerAlg, Config)
  920:                             of
  921:                                 {ok, {SystemDir,UserDir}} ->
  922:                                     ModAlgs = [{modify_algorithms,
  923:                                                 [{append,[{public_key,[alg(ServerAlg)]}]},
  924:                                                  {rm, [{public_key,[alg(ClientAlg)|inv_algs(ClientAlg)]}]}
  925:                                                 ]}],
  926:                                     [{system_dir,SystemDir},
  927:                                      {user_dir,UserDir}
  928:                                      | extend_optsL([daemon_opts,client_opts], ModAlgs, Config)]
  929:                             catch
  930:                                 error:{badmatch,{error,enoent}}:S ->
  931:                                     ct:log("~p:~p Stack:~n~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,S]),
  932:                                     {skip, no_key_file_found}
  933:                             end;
  934:                         false ->
  935:                             {skip, unsupported_server_algorithm}
  936:                     end;
  937:                 false ->
  938:                     {skip, unsupported_client_algorithm}
  939:             end;
  940:         true ->
  941:             {fail, disabled_algorithm_present}
  942:     end.
  943:             
  944:             
  945: setup_dirs(ClientAlg, ServerAlg, Config) ->
  946:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  947:     KeySrcDir = proplists:get_value(key_src_dir, Config),
  948:     Fmt = proplists:get_value(fmt, Config),
  949: 
  950:     System = lists:concat(["system_", ClientAlg, "_", ServerAlg, "_", Fmt]),
  951:     SystemDir = filename:join(PrivDir, System),
  952:     file:make_dir(SystemDir),
  953: 
  954:     User   = lists:concat(["user_", ClientAlg, "_", ServerAlg, "_", Fmt]),
  955:     UserDir   = filename:join(PrivDir, User),
  956:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
  957: 
  958:     HostSrcFile = filename:join(KeySrcDir, file(src,host,ServerAlg)),
  959:     HostDstFile = filename:join(SystemDir, file(dst,host,ServerAlg)),
  960: 
  961:     UserSrcFile = filename:join(KeySrcDir, file(src,user,ClientAlg)),
  962:     UserDstFile = filename:join(UserDir, file(dst,user,ClientAlg)),
  963: 
  964:     UserPubSrcFile = filename:join(KeySrcDir, file(src,user,ClientAlg)++".pub"),
  965:     AuthorizedKeys = filename:join(UserDir, "authorized_keys"),
  966: 
  967:     ct:log("UserSrcFile = ~p~nUserDstFile = ~p", [UserSrcFile, UserDstFile]),
  968:     {ok,_} = file:copy(UserSrcFile, UserDstFile),
  969:     ct:log("UserPubSrcFile = ~p~nAuthorizedKeys = ~p", [UserPubSrcFile, AuthorizedKeys]),
  970:     {ok,_} = file:copy(UserPubSrcFile, AuthorizedKeys),
  971:     ct:log("HostSrcFile = ~p~nHostDstFile = ~p", [HostSrcFile, HostDstFile]),
  972:     {ok,_} = file:copy(HostSrcFile, HostDstFile),
  973:     
  974:     ct:log("SystemDir = ~p~nUserDir = ~p", [SystemDir,UserDir]),
  975:     {ok, {SystemDir,UserDir}}.
  976: 
  977: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
  978: file(  _, host, dsa)     -> "ssh_host_dsa_key";
  979: file(  _, host, ecdsa)   -> "ssh_host_ecdsa_key";
  980: file(  _, host, ed25519) -> "ssh_host_ed25519_key";
  981: file(  _, host, ed448)   -> "ssh_host_ed448_key";
  982: file(  _, host, rsa_sha2)-> "ssh_host_rsa_key";
  983: file(src, host, rsa_sha1)-> "ssh_host_rsa_key";
  984: file(dst, host, rsa_sha1)-> "ssh_host_rsa_key";
  985: file(  _, user, dsa)     -> "id_dsa";
  986: file(  _, user, ecdsa)   -> "id_ecdsa";
  987: file(  _, user, ed25519) -> "id_ed25519";
  988: file(  _, user, ed448)   -> "id_ed448";
  989: file(  _, user, rsa_sha2)-> "id_rsa";
  990: file(src, user, rsa_sha1)-> "id_rsa";
  991: file(dst, user, rsa_sha1)-> "id_rsa".
  992: 
  993: alg(dsa)     -> 'ssh-dss';
  994: alg(ecdsa)   -> 'ecdsa-sha2-nistp256';
  995: alg(ed25519) -> 'ssh-ed25519';
  996: alg(ed448)   -> 'ssh-ed448';
  997: alg(rsa_sha2)-> 'rsa-sha2-256';
  998: alg(rsa_sha1)-> 'ssh-rsa'.
  999: 
 1000: inv_algs(rsa_sha1) -> algs(rsa_sha2);
 1001: inv_algs(_) -> [].
 1002: 
 1003: algs(dsa)     -> ['ssh-dss'];
 1004: algs(ecdsa)   -> ['ecdsa-sha2-nistp256', 'ecdsa-sha2-nistp384', 'ecdsa-sha2-521'];
 1005: algs(ed25519) -> ['ssh-ed25519'];
 1006: algs(ed448)   -> ['ssh-ed448'];
 1007: algs(rsa_sha2)-> ['rsa-sha2-256', 'rsa-sha2-384', 'rsa-sha2-512'];
 1008: algs(rsa_sha1)-> ['ssh-rsa'];
 1009: algs(A) -> [A].
 1010: 
 1011: 
 1012: 
 1013: default(Type, Alg) -> listed(algs(Alg), ssh_transport:default_algorithms(Type)).
 1014: 
 1015: supported(Type, Alg) -> listed(algs(Alg),
 1016:                                try
 1017:                                    ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(Type)
 1018:                                catch
 1019:                                    error:function_clause -> crypto:supports(Type)
 1020:                                end).
 1021: 
 1022: listed(As, L) -> lists:any(fun(A) -> lists:member(A,L) end,
 1023:                            As).
 1024:                                    
 1025:
